backend/main.mo: Defines data types and initial state for devotional content, journaling, fasting sessions, Bible references, reminders, and user data in a Motoko canister actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for high‑contrast theme and UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief descriptions of key frontend files, summarizing their purpose and UI/theme characteristics.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controller handling authentication, routing between pages, and global providers such as React Query and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright info, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai with high‑contrast styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, mobile sheet menu, and authentication controls using Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profile, devotional days, journal entries, Bible verses, and bookmark operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining themes, typography, animations, scrollbars, and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/BiblePage.tsx: Bible reading and search page with book/chapter navigation, verse display, bookmarking, and search results.
frontend/src/pages/DevotionPage.tsx: Displays a daily devotion with navigation, journaling (including voice input), and saving journal entries linked to the selected day.
frontend/src/pages/FastingPage.tsx: Manages fasting sessions with goal setting, progress tracking, reflections, and optional voice input.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the user's current devotional day, progress, and navigation options to continue devotions or open the Bible.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Lists all journal entries with sorting and navigation to each day's devotion, plus a placeholder export feature.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen introducing the devotional app, highlighting features, and handling authentication before starting the journey.
frontend/src/pages/MinistryPage.tsx: Displays ministry information including mission, contact details, location, and a link to support the ministry.
frontend/src/pages/MyJourneyPage.tsx: Displays the user’s progress, recent journal entries, bookmark counts, and profile info, with loading states and navigation to specific days.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for enabling daily reminders, setting reminder time, handling notification permissions, and sending test notifications with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, animations, and plugin usage for styling across the app.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current feature set and roadmap, detailing authentication, role management, devotional content, journaling, and related system capabilities.
